verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*,

If \w one|strong="H4310"\w* \w assay|strong="H5254"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w commune|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* thee, wilt thou \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w grieved|strong="H3811"\w*? But \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w withhold|strong="H6113"\w* himself \w from|strong="H1697"\w* \w speaking|strong="H4405"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* hast \w instructed|strong="H3256"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*, \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* hast \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w the|strong="H2388"\w* \w weak|strong="H7504"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Thy|strong="H6965"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w have|strong="H4405"\w* \w upholden|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H3766"\w* \w that|strong="H6965"\w* was \w falling|strong="H3782"\w*, \w And|strong="H6965"\w* thou hast made firm \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w feeble|strong="H3782"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H5060"\w* \w unto|strong="H5060"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6258"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w faintest|strong="H3811"\w*; \w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H6258"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* art troubled.

\w Is|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w thy|strong="H3373"\w* \w fear|strong="H3373"\w* \add of God\add* \w thy|strong="H3373"\w* \w confidence|strong="H3690"\w*, \add And\add* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w thy|strong="H3373"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w thy|strong="H3373"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*?

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w*, \w I|strong="H2142"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \add ever\add* perished, being \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*? \w Or|strong="H4310"\w* where were \w the|strong="H2142"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w cut|strong="H3582"\w* \w off|strong="H3582"\w*?

According \w as|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w*, \w they|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w plow|strong="H2790"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*, \w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* \w trouble|strong="H5999"\w*, \w reap|strong="H7114"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* same.

\w By|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* God they \w perish|strong="H3615"\w*, \w And|strong="H7307"\w* \w by|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w blast|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w his|strong="H3615"\w* \w anger|strong="H7307"\w* are they \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6963"\w* \w roaring|strong="H7581"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* fierce \w lion|strong="H3715"\w*, \w And|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w young|strong="H3715"\w* \w lions|strong="H3715"\w*, \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w broken|strong="H5421"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w lion|strong="H3833"\w* perisheth \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w lack|strong="H1097"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w prey|strong="H2964"\w*, \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w whelps|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6504"\w* \w abroad|strong="H6504"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* secretly \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w And|strong="H1697"\w* \w mine|strong="H4480"\w* ear \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w whisper|strong="H8102"\w* thereof.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w thoughts|strong="H5587"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w visions|strong="H2384"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w When|strong="H5307"\w* \w deep|strong="H8639"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8639"\w* \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* men,

\w Fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w came|strong="H7122"\w* \w upon|strong="H7122"\w* me, \w and|strong="H6106"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7460"\w*, Which made \w all|strong="H7230"\w* \w my|strong="H7230"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w to|strong="H6106"\w* \w shake|strong="H6342"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w passed|strong="H2498"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*; \w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w hair|strong="H8185"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w stood|strong="H1320"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w still|strong="H5975"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w could|strong="H5234"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w discern|strong="H5234"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* thereof; \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w form|strong="H8544"\w* \w was|strong="H6963"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w mine|strong="H5048"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \add There was\add* \w silence|strong="H1827"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \add saying\add*,

\w Shall|strong="H2891"\w* mortal \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w more|strong="H6213"\w* \w just|strong="H6663"\w* \w than|strong="H6663"\w* God? \w Shall|strong="H2891"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w more|strong="H6213"\w* \w pure|strong="H2891"\w* \w than|strong="H6663"\w* \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w putteth|strong="H7760"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* trust \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; \w And|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w angels|strong="H4397"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* chargeth \w with|strong="H7760"\w* \w folly|strong="H8417"\w*:

How much more \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H1004"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w clay|strong="H2563"\w*, Whose \w foundation|strong="H3247"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, Who \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w crushed|strong="H1792"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w moth|strong="H6211"\w*!

Betwixt \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H1242"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w they|strong="H1242"\w* are \w destroyed|strong="H3807"\w*: \w They|strong="H1242"\w* perish \w forever|strong="H5331"\w* \w without|strong="H1097"\w* \w any|strong="H7760"\w* \w regarding|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H2451"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w tent-cord|strong="H3499"\w* \w plucked|strong="H5265"\w* up within \w them|strong="H4191"\w*? \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.
